overview: Pauline Cushman leaves the theater to become a Federal spy. Working with Henry Holmes of the Secret Service, she escapes execution twice and helps Gen. Rosencrans in battle against Confederate generals Bragg, Forrest, and Morgan.
tagline: An Intensely Interesting Drama of a Wonderful Woman-A Page of Reality From the Civil War-Thrilling Scenes- Escapes-Daredevil Deeds. two Reels of Superb Sensation, Built on Fact.
title: Pauline Cushman, the Federal Spy
